_header: The wardrober of Venus bower [The wardraipper of Venus boure]
Title(s): ‘Of James Doig, kepar of the quenis wardrop’
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of James Doig, kepar of the quenis wardrop’ — six quatrains with refrain ‘madam ȝe heff an dangerous dog’

CULLl510.First Lines:
The wardraipper of Venus boureTo gif a dowblett he is als
                    doure…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…His gang garris all ȝour chalmer shogMadame ȝe haue
                    ane dangerous [dog]
CULLl510.Attributed Author:
Quod dumbar of James dog keiper of þe queins wardrop (f.
                        44v)

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
The wardraipper of wenus boureto giff a doublett he is als
                    doure…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…his gang garris all ȝour chalmeris schogmadam ȝe
                    heff a dangerous dog
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author:
quod dunbar of Iames dog kepair of þe quenis wardrep (p.
                    339)
